017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
020import java.lang.reflect.Type;
021
022import java.util.Arrays;
023import java.util.Objects;
024
025/**
026 * A {@link ParameterizedType} implementation.
027 *
028 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
029 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
030 *
031 * @see ParameterizedType
032 */
033public final class DefaultParameterizedType implements ParameterizedType {
034
035
036  /*
037   * Instance fields.
038   */
039
040
041  private final Type ownerType;
042
043  private final Type rawType;
044
045  private final Type[] actualTypeArguments;
046
047  private final int hashCode;
048
049
050  /*
051   * Constructors.
052   */
053
054
055  /**
056   * Creates a new {@link DefaultParameterizedType}.
057   *
058   * @param ownerType the {@link Type} that owns this {@link
059   * DefaultParameterizedType}; may be (and usually is) {@code null}
060   *
061   * @param rawType the raw type; must not be {@code null}; is most
062   * commonly a {@link Class} as in all JDKs through at least 17 and
063   * as mandated currently by the Java Language Specification
064   *
065   * @param actualTypeArguments the actual {@linkplain
066   * #getActualTypeArguments() actual type arguments} of this {@link
067   * DefaultParameterizedType}; may be {@code null} in which case a
068   * zero-length array will be used instead; will be cloned if
069   * non-{@code null} and if its length is greater than {@code 0}
070   *
071   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code rawType} is {@code
072   * null}
073   *
074   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code rawType} is an
075   * {@linkplain Class#isInstance(Object) instance of} {@link Class}
076   * and the length of the array returned by its {@link
077   * Class#getTypeParameters()} method is not the same as the length
078   * of the {@link actualTypeArguments} array (or {@code 0} if the
079   * {@code actualTypeArguments} array is {@code null})
080   */
081  public DefaultParameterizedType(final Type ownerType, final Type rawType, final Type... actualTypeArguments) {
082    super();
083    this.ownerType = ownerType;
084    this.rawType = Objects.requireNonNull(rawType, "rawType");
085    if (actualTypeArguments == null || actualTypeArguments.length <= 0) {
086      this.actualTypeArguments = JavaTypes.emptyTypeArray();
087    } else {
088      this.actualTypeArguments = actualTypeArguments.clone();
089    }
090    if (rawType instanceof Class<?> cls) {
091      final Type[] typeParameters = cls.getTypeParameters();
092      if (typeParameters.length != this.actualTypeArguments.length) {
093        throw new IllegalArgumentException("rawType: " + JavaTypes.toString(rawType) +
094                                           "; actualTypeArguments: " + Arrays.asList(actualTypeArguments));
095      }
096    }
097    this.hashCode = this.computeHashCode();
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * Creates a new {@link DefaultParameterizedType}.
102   *
103   * @param other the {@link ParameterizedType} to copy information
104   * from; must not be {@code null}
105   *
106   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code other} is {@code null}
107   *
108   * @see #DefaultParameterizedType(Type, Type, Type...)
109   */
110  public DefaultParameterizedType(final ParameterizedType other) {
111    this(other.getOwnerType(), other.getRawType(), other.getActualTypeArguments());
112  }
113
114
115  /*
116   * Instance methods.
117   */
118
119
120  @Override
121  public final Type getOwnerType() {
122    return this.ownerType;
123  }
124
125  @Override
126  public final Type getRawType() {
127    return this.rawType;
128  }
129
130  @Override
131  public final Type[] getActualTypeArguments() {
132    return this.actualTypeArguments.clone();
133  }
134
135  @Override
136  public final int hashCode() {
137    return this.hashCode;
138  }
139
140  private final int computeHashCode() {
141    return JavaTypes.hashCode(this);
142  }
143
144  @Override
145  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
146    if (other == this) {
147      return true;
148    } else if (other instanceof ParameterizedType p) {
149      return JavaTypes.equals(this, p);
150    } else {
151      return false;
152    }
153  }
154
155  @Override
156  public final String toString() {
157    return JavaTypes.toString(this);
158  }
159
160
161  /*
162   * Static methods.
163   */
164
165
166  /**
167   * If the supplied {@link ParameterizedType} is a {@link
168   * DefaultParameterizedType}, returns it; otherwise creates a new
169   * {@link DefaultParameterizedType} with the supplied {@link
170   * ParameterizedType}'s {@linkplain ParameterizedType#getOwnerType()
171   * owner type}, {@linkplain ParameterizedType#getRawType() raw type}
172   * and {@linkplain ParameterizedType#getActualTypeArguments() type
173   * arguments} and returns it.
174   *
175   * @param parameterizedType the {@link ParameterizedType} to
176   * effectively copy (or return); must not be {@code null}
177   *
178   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link DefaultParameterizedType}
179   *
180   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code parameterizedType} is
181   * {@code null}
182   *
183   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
184   *
185   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
186   * that it may return a new {@link DefaultParameterizedType} with
187   * each invocation).
188   *
189   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
190   * threads.
191   */
192  public static final DefaultParameterizedType of(final ParameterizedType parameterizedType) {
193    if (parameterizedType instanceof DefaultParameterizedType p) {
194      return p;
195    } else {
196      return new DefaultParameterizedType(parameterizedType);
197    }
198  }
199
200
201}
